casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
ELIAS V. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 8, 2016

Katherine C. Essington, in support of the petition.

Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 321, 147 A.3d 1102 (2016), is denied.
